mapper.sql: id, out_trade_no, associator_id, recharge_money, recharge_type, operation_time, remark, safetyone, safetytwo
mapper.insert:
insert into t_recharge_log
id,
out_trade_no,
associator_id,
recharge_money,
recharge_type,
operation_time,
remark,
safetyone,
safetytwo,

mapper.update:
update t_recharge_log
out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
associator_id = #{associatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_money = #{rechargeMoney,jdbcType=FLOAT},
recharge_type = #{rechargeType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_recharge_log set out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, associator_id = #{associatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recharge_money = #{rechargeMoney,jdbcType=FLOAT}, recharge_type = #{rechargeType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetyone = #{safetyone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safetytwo = #{safetytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select out_trade_no,recharge_money,recharge_type from t_recharge_log where associator_id = #{associatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by operation_time desc
